alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 9:52PM CDT until March 30 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Chickasawhay At Leakesville affecting Greene, Wayne and George Counties. For the Chickasawhay River...including Waynesboro, Leakesville... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chickasawhay At Leakesville. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 23.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest around 24.0 feet late tonight and remain steady through the day Monday. A gradual fall is then expected Tuesday into Wednesday and the river is forecast to fall below flood stage by Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
